title: Divya Ratna Kasula Haaram - Emerald & Diamond Embellished Necklace
materials: VVS Clarity). Features a delicate Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Kasula Haaram showcases a traditional South Indian design with a modern twist. The coin (Kasulu) design is re-imagined using CZ Diamonds with embedded rubies, adding a touch of contemporary elegance. The central pendant features a detailed floral motif adorned with CZ diamonds and a captivating pear-cut Emerald. The smaller pendant features an oval-cut Emerald. Delicate gold bead (Gundu) hangings complete the look.
colors: Predominantly gold with brilliant white from the CZ diamonds
accentuated by the vibrant green of the Emeralds and subtle touches of Ruby Red.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for Seemantham (Baby Shower) and half-saree functions. A stunning statement piece for modern formal events.
description: A blend of traditional South Indian Kasula design and contemporary diamond elegance, this Haaram is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship. The use of high-quality Emeralds and CZ diamonds ensures brilliance and enduring value. The Hyderabadi Polish adds a touch of regal sophistication. A timeless heirloom piece that symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
